attributes.action: Any employees classed as essential/keyworker to be given hazard payments
attributes.additional_details: Bring in a monthly payment bonus for those who are risking their mental and physical health within essential businesses and for keyworker.
attributes.background: If someone self isolates they are given sick pay, if an enforced closure means someone can't work they are being awarded 80% of their wage. But those risking their health physically and mentally because they are essential or a keyworker are not being awarded with any sort of bonus.

rejection.details:
You may wish to sign this petition calling for the same action: https://petition.parliament.uk/petitions/307619

You can find out more about coronavirus and how you can protect yourself and others here:

NHS website: https://www.nhs.uk/conditions/coronavirus-covid-19/
UK Government website: https://www.gov.uk/coronavirus

You can read NHS tips to help if you are worried about coronavirus here: https://www.nhs.uk/oneyou/every-mind-matters/coronavirus-covid-19-anxiety-tips
